extendedInfo.description: Introducing the NEW Campus Special App. It's more than just a couponing app, it's a ground-breaking mobile app that gives you the ability to redeem multiple offers from multiple businesses year-round while earning loyalty rewards. Now you can redeem the hottest deals for places around colleges and universities nationwide.Hungry? Now you can browse restaurant listings and order food right from your phone. Build and place an order from your phone - have it ready after class, or get it delivered right to your door!Features:* Uses your phone's GPS to find the nearest discounts and deals* Redeem coupons right on your phone* Quick access to phone numbers, addresses, and maps for restaurants and other businesses* Earn loyalty rewards at many businesses in your area* Order food from your phone â easily reorder your favorite dishes* Find an apartment from our new advanced apartment category

reviews.title: Amazing App!
reviews.comment: Campus Special is an amazing application full of great deals from local businesses in your college demographic! Highly recommended!
reviews.author: Maggie Hayes

reviews.title: Location services fail
reviews.comment: Used the app in the restaurant and it said I  was half a mile away. It wouldn\'t let me use the coupon cause I \"wasn\'t close enough.\" I would have saved a whole 5 dollars...
reviews.author: Karsten Rabe

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Very disappointed. I\'m sorry but \"come check us out\" is NOT a coupon. Same with getting a $2 slider that normally costs... yep $2..  Use actual coupons more often and maybe I\'ll raise my rating.
reviews.author: Ben Bieberitz

reviews.title: Used to be awesome...
reviews.comment: This app was amazing, then changes were made and it SUCKS now. Total loss of functionality and ease of use. Great job, guys...
reviews.author: Katie McMullen

reviews.title: Great for saving!
reviews.comment: I love this app because it makes saving easy nearly anywhere I shop, and if I wanted to go visit one of my friends at another college, I can get deals there too! Its a BIG improvement from the last version.
reviews.author: Lea Fordham

reviews.comment: Very unhappy that we advertised on this app and it does not function properly. I touch deals and it doesn\'t respond! Is this getting fixed soon???\tRidiculous!
reviews.author: Kelly Dutton

reviews.comment: recently I began to use the app again only to find that the awesome deals are really just unneeded and mediocre at best not only to note that it only covers about 5 different locations with one per search.. seems like a monopoly if u can only get deals at one  place even tho there are multiple shops within the area.
reviews.author: Mikayla Puskala

reviews.title: Cool app!
reviews.comment: Love this app! Who doesn\'t like discounts?!
reviews.author: Scott Walker

reviews.title: Great update!
reviews.comment: The app is conpletely revamped!! It is so easy to redeem the deals that are available and so many places to choose from! You can actually call the place ypu are interested in straight from the app. Cannot wait to see the future with this app!
reviews.author: Doug Landrum

reviews.comment: Awesome.
reviews.author: Stacey Justo

reviews.title: Campus savings
reviews.comment: Hmmm... Let\'s see
reviews.author: JaMiron Doakes

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Great deals, love the new app style!--They fixed all the errors!
reviews.author: Connor Devries

reviews.title: Alright
reviews.comment: Use it for school
reviews.author: Joy Odufuwa

reviews.comment: Sucks.
reviews.author: Dylan Styron

reviews.title: Amazing!!!
reviews.comment: Such a great app! It\'s so easy to use and every college kid loves to save money! I can\'t wait for more deals this year, I will be using this ALL the time! If you don\'t have this app, download it immediately!
reviews.author: olivia mallinger

reviews.title: Awesome App
reviews.comment: This app saves time, is less hassle, and overall extremely easy to use. Every college student needs to have this on their smartphone, and every business needs to get on this app!!!
reviews.author: Anthony Langer

reviews.title: Great App!!
reviews.comment: This App allows you to look through all the different businesses and see which deals they offer which is a huge help when deciding where to go!! As a college kid I don\'t have a lot of extra money and the Campus Special App really helps me utilize the money I do have in an efficient, easy-to-use way!! Definitely a must-have App!!!
reviews.author: Stephanie Jahn

reviews.title: Best app for coupons!!!
reviews.comment: This downloaded in less than one minute. I love the deals on here for my home town and i use the online food ordering site all of the time. I don\'t go anywhere without using a coupon and this app makes it so easy!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: YOU HAVE TO HAVE THIS!
reviews.comment: This app will meet all your college needs! You can have local deals at ALL kinds of places- even better you can search apartments. ALSO you can order food online. Every college student needs this app!
reviews.author: Alyssa Tumbleson

reviews.title: Easy to use!
reviews.comment: The app is simple and intuitive. Offers me great savings on some of my favorite places around town! Plus, the food court option makes delivery easier than ever.
reviews.author: Eric Frontiera
